name: Legend
classdesc:
JET Legend

A legend displays an interactive description of symbols, colors, etc used in graphical information representations. 
<oj-c-legend orientation='vertical' data='[[dataProvider]]'></oj-c-legend>

Accessibility

To make your component accessible, the application is required to include contextual information for screender readers using one or more the following methods as appropriate:
  • aria-describedby
  • aria-labelledby
  • aria-label
  • short-desc property of your items

When setting color, applications are responsible for making sure that the color meets the minimum contrast ratio

If your application has custom keyboard and touch shortcuts implemented for the component, these shortcuts can conflict with those of the component. It is the application's responsibility to disclose these custom shortcuts, possibly via a datatip or help popup.

In the case of the text truncating, applications should provide the untruncated string or contextual text to the datatip to make the component accessible.

Performance

Shaped Data

As a rule of thumb, it's recommended that applications use shaped data if possible for performance gains.

Keyboard

Key Action
Tab Move focus to next element.
Shift + Tab Move focus to previous element.
UpArrow Move focus to previous item.
DownArrow Move focus to next item.
LeftArrow Move focus to previous item (on left).
RightArrow Move focus to next item (on right).
Enter or Space Hides or unhides the data associated with the current item.

Touch End User Information

Target Gesture Action
Legend Item Tap Filter when hideAndShowBehavior is enabled.

tstype.value: interface CLegendElement<K extends string | number,D extends oj-c.Legend.Item<K> | oj-c.Legend.Section<K> | any> extends JetElement<LegendElementSettableProperties<K,D>>

ojsignature.value: interface CLegendElement<K extends string | number,D extends oj-c.Legend.Item<K> | oj-c.Legend.Section<K> | any> extends JetElement<LegendElementSettableProperties<K,D>>

name: data
description:
The DataProvider for the sections and items of the legend. It should provide a data tree where each node in the data tree corresponds to a section or item in the legend.
Nodes that are leaves will be treated as items. The row key will be used as the id for legend sections and items. Note that when using this attribute, a template for the itemTemplate and optionally sectionTemplate slots should be provided.
The DataProvider can either have an arbitrary data shape, in which case an element (and an element for hierarchical data) must be specified in the itemTemplate (and sectionTemplate) slot
or it can have oj.ojCLegend.Item (and oj.ojCLegend.Section) as its data shape, in which case no template is required.

name: drilling
description:
Whether drilling is enabled on all legend items.
Drillable objects will show a background opacity, a pointer cursor on hover, and fire ojDrill event on click.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Legend items will be drillable

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: Legend items will not be drillable

name: halign
description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the legend contents.

ojvalues.name: center
ojvalues.description: Legend contents will be center aligned

ojvalues.name: end
ojvalues.description: Legend contents will be end aligned

ojvalues.name: start
ojvalues.description: Legend contents will be start aligned

name: hiddenCategories
description: An array of categories that will be hidden.

name: hideAndShowBehavior
description: Defines whether the legend can be used to initiate hide and show behavior on referenced data items.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Legend can be used to initiate hide and show behavior on referenced data items.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: legend cannot be used to initiate hide and show behavior on referenced data items.

name: highlightedCategories
description: An array of categories that will be highlighted.

name: hoverBehavior
description: Defines the behavior applied when hovering over a legend item.

ojvalues.name: dim
ojvalues.description: Dimming hover behavior is applied.

ojvalues.name: none
ojvalues.description: No hover behavior will be applied.

name: orientation
description: Defines the orientation of the legend, which determines the direction in which the legend items are laid out.

ojvalues.name: horizontal
ojvalues.description: Legend items will be horizontally placed in available space.

ojvalues.name: vertical
ojvalues.description: Legend items will be vertically stacked.

name: symbolHeight
description: The height of the legend symbol in pixels. If the value is 0, it will take the same value as symbolWidth. If both symbolWidth and symbolHeight are 0, then it will use a default value that may vary based on theme.

name: symbolWidth
description: The width of the legend symbol in pixels. If the value is 0, it will take the same value as symbolHeight. If both symbolWidth and symbolHeight are 0, then it will use a default value that may vary based on theme

name: textStyle
description: The CSS style object defining the style of the legend item text.

name: textStyle.color
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/color)

name: textStyle.fontFamily
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-family)

name: textStyle.fontSize
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-size)

name: textStyle.fontStyle
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-style)

name: textStyle.fontWeight
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-weight)

name: textStyle.textDecoration
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration)

name: valign
description: Defines the vertical alignment of the legend contents.

ojvalues.name: middle
ojvalues.description: The legend items will be middle aligned.

ojvalues.name: bottom
ojvalues.description: The legend items will be bottom aligned.

ojvalues.name: top
ojvalues.description: The legend items will be top aligned.

name: sectionTitleStyle
description:
The CSS style object defining the style of the section titles' text.
The following style properties are supported: color, fontFamily, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, textDecoration

name: sectionTitleStyle.color
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/color)

name: sectionTitleStyle.fontFamily
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-family)

name: sectionTitleStyle.fontSize
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-size)

name: sectionTitleStyle.fontStyle
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-style)

name: sectionTitleStyle.fontWeight
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/font-weight)

name: sectionTitleStyle.textDecoration
description: [MDN Reference](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/text-decoration)

name: sectionTitleHalign
description: The horizontal alignment of the section titles.

ojvalues.name: center
ojvalues.description: The section title will be center aligned.

ojvalues.name: end
ojvalues.description: The section title will be end aligned.

ojvalues.name: start
ojvalues.description: The section title will be start aligned.

name: setProperty
description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

name: getProperty
description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

name: setProperties
description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

name: ojDrill
description: Triggered during a drill gesture (single click on the legend item).

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the drilled item

name: itemTemplate
description:
The itemTemplate slot is used to specify the template for creating items of the legend. The slot content must be wrapped in a <template> element. The content of the template should be a single <oj-c-legend-item> element. See the oj-c-legend-item doc for more details.

When the template is executed for each area, it will have access to the components's binding context containing the following properties:

  • $current - an object that contains information for the current node. (See the table below for a list of properties available on $current)
  • alias - if 'data-oj-as' attribute was specified, the value will be used to provide an application-named alias for $current.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data object of the current item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key of the current item.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The zero-based index of the current item relative to the parent.

properties.name: parentData
properties.description: An array of data objects of the outermost to innermost parents of the node

properties.name: parentKey
properties.description: The key of the parent node

name: sectionTemplate
description:
The sectionTemplate slot is used to specify the template for creating sections of the legend. The slot content must be wrapped in a <template> element. The content of the template should be a single <oj-c-legend-section> element. See the oj-c-legend-section doc for more details.

When the template is executed for each area, it will have access to the components's binding context containing the following properties:

  • $current - an object that contains information for the current node. (See the table below for a list of properties available on $current)
  • alias - if 'data-oj-as' attribute was specified, the value will be used to provide an application-named alias for $current.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data object of the current section.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key of the current section.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The zero-based index of the current section.

name: touchDoc
description:
Target Gesture Action
Legend Item Tap Filter when hideAndShowBehavior is enabled.

name: Item
description: Object type that defines a legend data item.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the legend item.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The legend item text.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: An array of categories for the legend item. Legend items currently only support a single category.

properties.name: symbolType
properties.description: The type of legend symbol to display.

ojvalues.name: line
ojvalues.description: The legend symbol will be a line.

ojvalues.name: lineWithMarker
ojvalues.description: The legend symbol will be a line and a marker.

ojvalues.name: image
ojvalues.description: The legend symbol will be an image.

ojvalues.name: marker
ojvalues.description: The legend symbol will be a marker.

properties.name: source
properties.description: The URI of the image of the legend symbol.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the legend symbol (line or marker). When symbolType is "lineWithMarker", this attribute defines the line color and the markerColor attribute defines the marker color.

properties.name: borderColor
properties.description: The border color of the marker. Only applies if symbolType is "marker" or "lineWithMarker

properties.name: lineStyle
properties.description: The line style. Only applies when the symbolType is "line" or "lineWithMarker".

ojvalues.name: dotted
ojvalues.description: Line will have dotted strokes.

ojvalues.name: dashed
ojvalues.description: Line will have dashed strokes.

ojvalues.name: solid
ojvalues.description: Line will have a solid stroke.

properties.name: lineWidth
properties.description: The line width in pixels. Only applies when the symbolType is "line" or "lineWithMarker.

properties.name: markerShape
properties.description: The shape of the marker. Only applies if symbolType is "marker" or "lineWithMarker". Does not apply if a custom image is specified.

ojvalues.name: circle
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of circular shape.

ojvalues.name: diamond
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of diamond shape.

ojvalues.name: ellipse
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of ellipse shape.

ojvalues.name: human
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of human shape.

ojvalues.name: plus
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of plus shape.

ojvalues.name: rectangle
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of rectangular shape.

ojvalues.name: square
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of square shape.

ojvalues.name: star
ojvalues.description: The marker will be of star shape.

ojvalues.name: triangleDown
ojvalues.description: The  marker will be of triangular shape facing down.

ojvalues.name: triangleUp
ojvalues.description: The  marker will be of triangular shape facing up.

properties.name: markerColor
properties.description: The color of the marker, if different than the line color. Only applies if the symbolType is "lineWithMarker".

properties.name: shortDesc
properties.description: The description of this legend item. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text.

name: Section
description: Object type that defines a section data item.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the legend section. For the DataProvider case, the key for the node will be used as the id.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The id of the legend section. For the DataProvider case, the key for the node will be used as the id.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the legend section.
